feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: cl_md_bp_maintain=>maintain - Create only contact person
entry.content:
Greetings experts,

I am currently creating Business Partner (Contact Person) with the  cl_md_bp_maintain=>maintain method.

I have checked the table containing the roles, only the role BUP001 (Contact Person) is in it. 
But when creating the business partner the 0000000 Role (Base BP) is always created additionally.
How can i avoid the addition of the 0000000 Role while still using the maintain method?
So that only the Contact Person with BUP001 is created.
I know that it is possible to only create a Contact Person (BP) using the transaction code BUA1.

entry.title: Custom fields added to extended SEGW OData entity not available in metadata
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

In Fiori App ID: F0843 (Post Goods Receipt for Purchasing Document), we are trying to add some custom fields in entity GR4PO_DL_Item of OData service MMIM_GR4PO_DL_SRV by redefinition and importing properties that are already available as an .include in the line item type MMIM_GR4PO_DL_ITEM.

After this we redefined "Define" method of MPC_EXT class with code:

  METHOD define.

  super->define( ).

  DATA(lo_entity_type) = model->get_entity_type( iv_entity_name = 'GR4PO_DL_Item' ).

  " Expand the specific include structure to expose its fields
  lo_entity_type->add_auto_expand_include(
    EXPORTING
      iv_include_name     = 'MMIM_GR4PO_DL_ITEM'
      iv_bind_conversions = abap_true
  ).
ENDMETHOD.

We followed the same approach as shown in this learning journey:

https://learning.sap.com/courses/building-odata-services-with-sap-gateway/redefining-an-sap-gateway-service

We already generated the Runtime objects and there seems to be no error as metadata loading properly. However, in the metadata the custom fields are not available and we are not sure what could be missing. The metadata does show the all the inlcudes but does not show the fields added to include, even though they are available in extended entity type.

Did someone face similar situation and can help in finding the solution?

entry.title: JSON Payload Download Implementation in RAP Application
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

I am currently working on a custom RAP (RESTful ABAP Programming Model) Application in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. In this application, we use an API to send data to an external portal.

Now there is a new requirement when the user clicks a button, the JSON payload that is used in the ABAP program for sending data via the API should be downloaded in JSON format.

For this purpose, I have already created a custom action in the Behavior Definition, and the button is visible in the Application. My question is how to implement the download functionality so that the same JSON payload used for the API call can be downloaded by the user in JSON format and Also, please explain how to implement the JSON download functionality in the RAP application with step by step guidance.

Thank you,

entry.title: Inter-company billing transfer IDOC issue(about enhance)
entry.content:
Hi All,

When we initiate an inter-company billing, the corresponding IDOC is automatically forwarded.

Now we need to set up accounting on IDOC.

The line that originally had EWLNR='*' set in OBCB, the account assignment is 51110090.

Now, a new line EWLNR='99890007' has been added, with the account assignment 70100001.

However, because one subject represents costs and the other revenue, the screen configurations are different.

This causes the following error in IDOC. Because our system's revenue category does not have a quantity field.

Is there an enhancement that allows removing the quantity on the IDOC before the throw?

Are there any other suggested approaches?

 

If anything above is unclear, please feel free to ask further questions. 

Thanks All !

entry.title: Pass DEV transport orders to the QAS queue
entry.content:
Good morning, could someone please guide me on how to move a released order from DEV to the QAS queue? I need to re-import an old order to both QA and Production, but it's not appearing in the queue. A few months ago, we migrated from Azure to RISE, and now the old orders we imported while on Azure are no longer showing up in the QA and Production queues. I only see the released order in DEV under transaction SE10.

 

I hope someone can help me. Thanks.

entry.title: String type field length limitation issue when mapping HANA SQL script dataset to an ABAP itab.
entry.content:
Hello experts,

When I'm mapping HANA SQL script dataset to an ABAP itab, there is a length limitation with string type fields.

string_agg(t5.json_data, ' ' order by canum) as json_data "AS NVARCHAR
to_clob(string_agg( t5.json_data,'' order by canum )      "AS CLOB

This function works correctly in the DBeaver query window, successfully returning a string with an actual field value length that exceeds 27,000 characters.

However, this function does not perform as expected when mapping a HANA dataset to an ABAP internal table.

It faces limitations, such as nvarchar being restricted to 5,000 characters and clob to 16,384 characters, resulting in the truncation of the actual field value.

The code is as follows:

types: begin of ty_data_in,
           count           type i,
           enq_lck_arg     type char50,
           tstp            type timestamp,
           itfid           type ze_itfid,
           id              type zfunc_log_id,
           func_name       type zfunc_log_data-func_name,
           func_parameter  type zfunc_log_data-func_parameter,
           func_paramtype  type zfunc_log_data-func_paramtype,
           func_structure  type zfunc_log_data-func_structure,
           func_defaultval type zfunc_log_data-func_defaultval,
           func_type       type zfunc_log_data-func_type,
           func_class      type zfunc_log_data-func_class,
           func_ref_class  type zfunc_log_data-func_ref_class,
           json_data       type string,
           proc            type flag,
         end of ty_data_in. 
  data: lt_data_in     type table of ty_data_in with empty key,
        lt_stmt        type table of string,
        l_stmt         type string.

lt_stmt[] = value #( ( |with | )
				   ( |t2 as (| )
				   ( |select t1.note3 as enq_lck_arg,t1.tzntstmps_beg as tstp,t1.note1 as itfid,t1.id| )
				   ( |  from zfunc_log as t1| )
				   ( |  where t1.note1 { l_zrfcid }| )
				   ( |    and t1.erdat { l_erdat }| )
				   ( |    and t1.code in ('I')| )
				   ( |),| )
				   ( |t3 as (select t2.enq_lck_arg,sum( 1 ) as count from t2 group by t2.enq_lck_arg order by t2.enq_lck_arg),| )
				   ( |t4 as (| )
				   ( |select t2.enq_lck_arg,t2.tstp,t2.itfid,t2.id,t3.count| )
				   ( |  from t2| )
				   ( |  join t3 on t3.enq_lck_arg = t2.enq_lck_arg| )
				   ( |  order by t3.count,t2.enq_lck_arg,t2.tstp,t2.itfid,t2.id| )
				   ( |)| )
				   ( |select t4.count,t4.enq_lck_arg,t4.tstp,t4.itfid,t4.id,| )
				   ( |       t5.func_name,t5.func_parameter,t5.func_paramtype,t5.func_structure,t5.func_defaultval,t5.func_type,t5.func_class,t5.func_ref_class,string_agg( t5.json_data,' ' order by canum ) as json_data| )
				   ( |  from t4| )
				   ( |  join zfunc_log_data as t5 on t5.id = t4.id| )
				   ( |  group by t4.count,t4.enq_lck_arg,t4.tstp,t4.itfid,t4.id,t5.func_name,t5.func_parameter,t5.func_paramtype,t5.func_structure,t5.func_defaultval,t5.func_type,t5.func_class,t5.func_ref_class| )
				   ( |  order by t4.count,t4.enq_lck_arg,t4.tstp,t4.itfid,t4.id,t5.func_name,t5.func_parameter,t5.func_paramtype,t5.func_structure,t5.func_defaultval,t5.func_type,t5.func_class,t5.func_ref_class;| )
				   ).
l_stmt = reduce #( init sum type string for wa in lt_stmt[] next sum = cond #( when sum is initial then wa else |{ sum }{ wa }| ) ). 

perform frm_hana_exec_query tables lt_data_in[] using l_stmt."json_data string type  still got length limit

form frm_hana_exec_query tables pt_data type table
                         using  p_stmt type string.
  data: l_s_dbindex type dbindex,
        l_stmt      type string,
        lref_data   type ref to data,
        lref_stmt   type ref to cl_sql_statement,
        lref_rslt   type ref to cl_sql_result_set.
  field-symbols: <fs_data> type any.

  try.
      assign pt_data[] to <fs_data>.
      l_stmt = p_stmt.

      create object lref_stmt.
      "lref_stmt->set_param( ref #( tabname ) ).
      "lref_stmt->set_param( ref #( l_schema ) ).

      lref_rslt = lref_stmt->execute_query( l_stmt ).
      get reference of <fs_data> into lref_data.
      lref_rslt->set_param_table( lref_data ).
      lref_rslt->next_package( ).
      lref_rslt->close( ).
    catch cx_sql_exception into data(lref_sqlerr).
      free: <fs_data>.
      data(l_msg) = lref_sqlerr->get_longtext( ).
      message |HANA QUERY ERROR: { l_msg }| type 'E'.
  endtry.
endform.

entry.title: Corrupted file during extraction of ABAP 7.52 SP04 Developer Edition
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm setting up the SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP 7.52 SP04 Developer Edition and downloaded all 11 RAR parts (TD752SP04part01.rar through TD752SP04part11.rar) from the SAP Developer Trials page.

During extraction, I consistently get this error:

 
Data error: server\TAR\x86_64\dbdata.tgz-aa

Here‚Äôs what I‚Äôve tried so far:

  • Downloaded all parts multiple times using a stable connection.

  • Verified I have over 250 GB of free space on my üòß drive.

  • Used unrar x TD752SP04part01.rar to extract.

  • Re-downloaded part02 (where the error seems to originate).

Despite these steps, the error persists.

Could someone please confirm:

  1. Whether the current download packages are intact.

  2. If official SHA-256 checksums are available for each part.

  3. If updated or alternate download links exist for the 7.52 SP04 appliance.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

Faith

entry.title: ME2N ‚ÄúStill to be Delivered‚Äù quantity calculation logic
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am developing a custom Purchase Order report and I am trying to replicate the standard SAP logic used in transaction ME2N.

I need to calculate the field ‚ÄúStill to be Delivered‚Äù exactly as shown in ME2N. Since this value is not stored directly in any single table, I tried to derive it based on schedule line and goods receipt data.

Currently, I am using the following logic:
Still to be Delivered = EKET-MENGE ‚Äì EKET-WEMNG
Where:
EKET-MENGE = Scheduled Quantity
EKET-WEMNG = Quantity already received via Goods Receipt
However, in some cases, the calculated value in my report does not match the ME2N output, which indicates that ME2N is applying additional business logic.
Therefore, I would like to understand the complete standard logic used by ME2N for this calculation.

Could you please confirm whether ME2N also considers the following during this calculation:
Delivery completed indicator (EKPO-ELIKZ)
Final delivery flag (EKPO-EREKZ)
Deleted schedule lines (EKET-LOEKZ)
Reversed GR quantities from EKBE
Multiple schedule lines per PO item

If there is any standard function module, class, or BAPI used internally by ME2N to derive this value, kindly suggest.

Thanks in advance for your guidance.

Best Regards,
Ashok

entry.title: Adobe Forms: best approach for long texts with mixed formatting and dynamic lengt
entry.content:
Hello,

I am creating my first Adobe Form and I have some doubts about how to design its structure.

The form I need to build has the first 3 pages containing a large amount of text, divided into several paragraphs. Each paragraph has a title that must be displayed in bold, followed by normal text.

Inside some of these paragraphs I need to insert ‚Äúfloating‚Äù fields. Most of the time these fields will contain short values, but in some cases they may contain long text, so the paragraphs can grow dynamically and flow across pages.

My initial idea was to maintain all the text as a standard text (SO10), read it using READ_TEXT, and then replace the required variables in ABAP before passing the final string to the form.

However, my doubt is related to the paragraph titles that must be in bold. As far as I understand, it is not possible to have part of a text in bold and another part in normal style within the same text object in Adobe Forms. This also seems not possible even using JavaScript. Is that correct?

If this is not possible, my alternative idea would be to split the content into multiple elements: one bold text for each paragraph title, followed by one standard text for the paragraph itself, for example:

 
FORM TITLE

Paragraph title 1
Standard text 1

Paragraph title 2
Standard text 2

Paragraph title 3
Standard text 3

With this approach, my intention would be to place all these elements inside the first body page, allowing the page to grow dynamically based on the length of the texts and the substituted variables. This way, all paragraphs would flow one after another without forced page breaks or unnecessary white spaces.

Any guidance or best practices would be appreciated.

entry.title: UoM changed in Va02 not reflecting in MB51
entry.content:
Hi,

A sales order is created in VA01 with order quantity in bottles. After saving the order, the entry is showing in MB51.  Then the user goes to VA02 to change the unit from bottles to Cases. After saving the order when checking MB51, the new units (CS) and the converted quantity not showing in the list of MB51. 

When debugged, I could see that MSEG table is not hit for any updates during the process and I can see that MB51 fields are coming from MSEG.

I would like to understand if this is expected behavior or if there is anything I am missing. If I cannot see the changes in MB51, where should I check?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Using SAP Trademark/Screenshot and own videos "using SAP products" to create training content
entry.content:
Dear team,

 

my company plans to craete a video training course for people to loarn ABAP develpment using the SAP BTP ABAP environment and ABAP Development tools.

The video training course is planned to be published on a large online learning platform and would be need to be bought by the trainee.

The videos will show and use the followign SAP products/trademarks first an a short slide presentation as Intro and second in the video traning itself:

-Trademarks: SAP, SAP ABAP, , etc.

-Screenshots: SAP BTP ABAP environment, ABAP Development tools

-Product training: SAP BTP ABAP environment, ABAP Development tools

We reviewed  copyright and trademark notice( Informationen √ºber Urheberrechte | About SAP) but could not find more details about using SAP trademarks, screenshots and products in online learnings offers.

What we can see is that many companies create content in their own name and use SAP's trademark and products for that on the large online learning platoforms like udemy and co. Can anybody support on the question if this is allowed to do so?

entry.title: value of MCHB-CLABS always returns as 0 in AMDP SQLScript
entry.content:
Below is the AMDP query, I dont know why for all 3 approaches I am getting clabs, clabs2, clabs3 value as 0.000 or 0 but never actual value. It does return a value in ABAP SQL. What am I doing wrong?

lt_mchb_base = SELECT

mchb.matnr,

mchb.charg,

mchb.clabs,

mchb.mandt,

mchb.ersda,

CAST(mchb.clabs AS DECIMAL(15, 3)) AS clabs2,

CAST(mchb.clabs AS DOUBLE ) AS clabs3,

mchb.werks,

mchb.lgort

FROM mchb WHERE mandt = SESSION_CONTEXT('CLIENT');

entry.title: QM01 + workflow email subject issue.
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

In QM01, the notification triggers an email through a workflow. The email subject is taken from a custom class variable and mapped to the ‚ÄúWork Item Text‚Äù. However, when users log in with other languages, the email subject appears as an abbreviated description instead of the expected text.

Thanks with Regards,

Vallamuthu M.

entry.title: Need BAdI for Auto-Setting Validity Date in Sales Enquiries
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a requirement for sales enquiries (document type IN) where:

  1. Auto-Set Validity Date
    • When the enquiry is saved, if the Validity Date is empty, it should be automatically set to 30 days from the Enquiry Date.
  2. Freeze Item Quantity After Validity Expiry
    • If the current date is greater than the Validity Date:
      • User cannot change Item Quantity.
      • Other fields should remain editable.
  3. Restriction
    • This logic should apply only to Enquiries and must not affect Sales Orders or Quotations.

I have tried searching for a BAdI in SE18/SE19 and checked the following standard BAdIs, but none of them seem suitable:

BADI_SD_SALES, BADI_SD_SALES_BASIC,  BADI_SD_CM, BADI_LAYER, ADDR_PRINTFORM_SHORT, BADI_SD_SALES_ITEM, CHECK_COBL_ADDON, EHS_DG_002, ATP_PUBLISH_RESULTS, BADI_SD_TO_FM, BADI_ISPS_GRANT, DIP_UPDATE_FKDAT

Could anyone suggest which BAdI or enhancement point I can use to implement this requirement for sales enquiries only?

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: CX_DBA_PARSE_ERROR in DBACOCKPIT Dump History - ASE 16.0.04.07 on SAP Kernel 754
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am encountering a dump in DBACOCKPIT when trying to access Backup and Recovery -> Database Dump History.

Error Details:

  • Exception: CX_DBA_PARSE_ERROR

  • Class: CL_SYB_DBMS_UTILS

  • Method: CAST_FMT_TSTAMP_TO_DB6TSTAMP

  • Message: Unable to parse date/time.

System Environment:

  • SAP Kernel: 754 Patch 628 (64-bit Unicode)

  • DB Client Library: Sybase ASE 16.0.04.07

  • OS: SLES 15

What I have checked so far:

  1. OS Locales: The environment variables for sidadm and sybsid are set to en_US.UTF-8.

     

  2. https://me.sap.com/notes/2780872/E: I found this Note which describes the exact issue, but it only references older SAP Notes (for Basis 7.40) and does not provide specific correction instructions for Basis 754.

  3. Note 1558958: This collection note also seems to target older releases.

It seems like the ABAP parser cannot handle the date/time format returned by the ASE 16.0.04.07 engine.

Does anyone know the specific Correction Collection Note for SAP_BASIS 754 that addresses this timestamp parsing issue? Or is there a specific DB parameter/locale setting within ASE that could force a compatible date format?

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.content:

For passing the data of Contract Header into Call off Sales Order header, which extension point will be used? is SD_SLS_MODIFY_HEAD correct? I am trying to pass the values of some standard and custom fields.

entry.title: HTML Controls Misbehaving in SAP ‚Äì SE80 and Workflow task in Blank
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I‚Äôm experiencing a strange issue in SAP (SAPGUI 800), some UI elements no longer work properly:

  • In SE80, within the Repository Browser, I cannot switch between function groups, packages, or other objects. Instead of the usual content, I only see a blank box.

  • Similarly, Workflow tasks appear completely blank.

I suspect this may be related to installing Adobe Designer for Adobe Forms, but I‚Äôm not entirely sure. I think it started malfunctioning since I installed it, although I only noticed it days later.

I couldn‚Äôt even access the SAP Community page at first‚Äîit kept giving me a ‚Äúpage not found‚Äù error. After clearing cookies, I was able to log in, though I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs related; it might just be a coincidence.

Has anyone seen similar issues with HTML controls in SAP? Any suggestions on how to restore the normal behavior would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

entry.title: Add variant of main program to called program in a background job
entry.content:
I have a main program (ZMANISH_BACKGROUND) which has a selection screen as shown.

The above program will be executed in the background via SM36. A variant will be created after entering the plant and date and this particular variant will be provided in SM36 with the jobname and the program name.

The main program ZMANISH_BACKGROUND is submitting another program ZSCM_AUTO_CONF3_NEW which is also triggered in the background. This program has no parameters.

When the job is scheduled and I go to SM37 I can see 2 jobs, one for the main program and the other for the called program. Below are my questions:

1) Since both programs are running in the background, 2 jobs are getting created, one with a spool (ZSCM_AUTO_CONF3_NEW) and the other without a spool (ZMANISH_BACKGROUND).

Is it possible to delete the job without the spool programmatically ? The functional wants only the job with the spool to be displayed.

2) The job without the spool displays the variant name which was saved .

However the job with the spool displays a system generated number as the variant

Is it possible to insert the variant 'MANISH'  to the job with the spool , instead of the random number being generated ?

Thanks!

Manish
